Universal Fighting System UFS Soul Calib.description: Based off the popular Soulcalibur VI video game, Transcending history and the world, a tale of souls and swords.

Universal Fighting System UFS Yu Yu Haku.description: This display contains 24 booster packs of 10 cards each for the Yu Yu Hakusho Collectible Card Game.

Universal Fighting System UFS Seventh Cr.description: The year is 1929, in a world much like our own, an enigmatic organization known only as "The Church" has kept the world safe from magic and monsters for centuries, allowing culture and civilization to flourish.
